flawed_nl_solution:
If the lorry is loaded with 20 bags of apples, each weighing 60 pounds, it will have an additional weight of 20*60=<<20*60=12000>>12000
The total weight of the lorry after being loaded with the bags of apples will be 500+12000=<<500+12000=12500>>12500 pounds

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 1200, not 12000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
